isis.stitle: EC-30 ABS / ATC CONTROLLER - BENDIX ACOM FOR WINDOWS

svcproc.title: BENDIX ACOM FOR WINDOWS
svcproc.para: Bendix ACom for Windows* (*Windows is a registered trademark of Microsoft Corporation) is a PC-based program that provides technicians with the highest level of diagnostic information and control of the EC-30. See Figure 12. With ACom, the technician can perform the following:

When connecting to the EC-30 using a personal computer, the computer standard protocol (RS-232) needs to be translated into the heavy duty truck standard protocol (J1708). The DCI performs the function of protocol translating and is attached between the computer and the vehicle diagnostic connector. If a DCI is not available, a standard RS-232/J1708 converter can be obtained from a local electronics parts supplier. It may be necessary to isolate the EC-30 from other vehicle ECU communication links when a standard RS-232/J1708 converter is used.
For more information on the Bendix ACom for Windows program, contact Bendix or refer to your local authorized Bendix dealer.
